question.text:
Consider the following three statements (A-C) and choose the correct option to fill the blanks:-

A) _______ helps to stop substance from leaking cross a tissue.

B) In all connective tissue except, _______ the cells secrete fibres.

C) ________ cells produce and secrete fibres in connective tissue

options.text: A = gap junction, B = cartilage, C = macrophase
A = tight junction, B = Bones, C = Fibroblast
A = tight junction, B = Blood, C = Fibroblast
A = Desmosomes, B = Blood, C = Mast cells

solution.text: Tight Junctions form the closest contact between adjacent cells known in nature. Blood cells do not secrete fibres (The matrix of blood is not fibrous though and is the plasma ). Fibroblast cell secretes fibres.
